eclasstool.model.chat

Interface RemoteChat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteChat
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RemoteChat models an interface for handling comments made in the chatroom from client to the server.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
